statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={3.3} , \displaystyle{b}={5.9}, \displaystyle{c}={6.6}, and \displaystyle{d}={7.5}, with diagonal length \displaystyle{e}={7.9} from the intersection of a and d to the intersection of b and c . Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
